price: Mu vy’ukuri, abatanga mu bitarekuwe canke mu buryo bw’isesagura ry’ubutunzi, ni incuti za shetani mu gukwiragiza ubwononyi n’ivyaha; burya shetani yamye ari umugarariji karuhariwe w’inema z’Imana yayo Rurema Allah;
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُبَذِّرِينَ كَانُوٓاْ إِخۡوَٰنَ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِۖ وَكَانَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ لِرَبِّهِۦ كَفُورٗا

meta.transliteration: inna al-mubadhirīna kānū ikh'wāna al-shayāṭīni wakāna al-shayṭānu lirabbihi kafūran
